price: 2 Le Coran est une révélation d’Allah, le Tout-Puissant, l’Omniscient,
arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡعَلِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: tanzīlu al-kitābi mina al-lahi al-ʿazīzi al-ʿalīmi
